text: Krothuss is an ancient kraken horror from Nephalia , Innistrad . Krothuss, an ancient, horrific kraken, slept deeply beneath the waves of Nephalia . The subject of worship by many cults, Krothuss desires nothing but pure destruction. Extremely adverse to light, it was not willing to surface until now. Fueled by the eternal night , Runo Stromkirk performed a mystical ritual to compel Krothuss to the surface. Unless day breaks soon, all of Innistrad is in danger from this hulking monstrosity.
